users.title: All Members
users.description: View and manage all users in the system
users.addUserDetails: Fill in the details to add a new user.
users.noUsersFiltered: No users match your current filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.
users.noUsersEmpty: Get started by adding your first user to the system.

report.title: Contribution Report
report.description: View user contributions within the selected date range
report.noContributionsHint: Try selecting a different date range

groups.title: Group Management
groups.description: Organize users into groups and manage their roles
groups.addGroupDetails: Fill in the details to create a new group.
groups.noGroupsDescription: Create your first group to organize users and manage permissions.
groups.noUsersInGroup: No users in this group yet.
groups.cannotDeleteWithUsers: This group cannot be deleted because it has users assigned.
groups.confirmDeleteGroup: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
groups.reassignUsersFirst: Please reassign or remove all users from this group before deleting.
groups.deleteGroupFailed: Failed to delete group. Please try again.

batches.title: Batch Management
batches.description: Upload batches and monitor task progress
batches.cardDescription: Manage batch uploads and view task progress
batches.noBatchesDescription: Upload your first batch of image transcription tasks to get started.
batches.selectTaskToPreview: Select a task from the list to preview

upload.title: Upload Batch
upload.description: Create a new batch by uploading a JSON file containing image transcription tasks.
upload.fileFormatHint: File should contain an array of tasks with name, url, and optional transcript
upload.successDescription: {{count}} tasks have been added to the batch.
upload.failedDescription: Failed to upload batch. Please try again.
